solution_line_template: The vegan restaurant serves {total_dishes} - {beans_lentils_dishes} - {beans_seitan_dishes} = <<{total_dishes}-{beans_lentils_dishes}-{beans_seitan_dishes}={dishes_one_protein}>>{dishes_one_protein} dishes with only one kind of protein.
There are {dishes_one_protein} / {half_remaining_divisor} = <<{dishes_one_protein}/{half_remaining_divisor}={dishes_only_beans}>>{dishes_only_beans} dishes with only beans.
There is {dishes_only_beans} / {seitan_ratio_divisor} = <<{dishes_only_beans}/{seitan_ratio_divisor}={dishes_only_seitan}>>{dishes_only_seitan} dish with only seitan.

Thus, there are {dishes_one_protein} - {dishes_only_beans} - {dishes_only_seitan} = <<{dishes_one_protein}-{dishes_only_beans}-{dishes_only_seitan}={dishes_only_lentils}>>{dishes_only_lentils} dishes with only lentils.

There are also {beans_lentils_dishes} dishes with beans and lentils, so there are {dishes_only_lentils} + {beans_lentils_dishes} = <<{dishes_only_lentils}+{beans_lentils_dishes}={total_dishes_with_lentils}>>{total_dishes_with_lentils} dishes that include lentils.
